languages.text: "Да будут помыслы твои Его лучом разящим. Яко тает предвечная ночь от прикосновения светила, так да погибнут от длани твоей лики скверны, во мраке таящейся".

traits.locale_text: "Да будут помыслы твои Его лучом разящим. Яко тает предвечная ночь от прикосновения светила, так да погибнут от длани твоей лики скверны, во мраке таящейся".

languages.text: "Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."
languages.original_text: "Да будут помыслы твои Его лучом разящим. Яко тает предвечная ночь от прикосновения светила, так да погибнут от длани твоей лики скверны, во мраке таящейся".

traits.locale_text: "Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."
"Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."

"Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."
"Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."

languages.text: «Sean sus pensamientos como rayos de Su luz justiciera. Así como la noche eterna se disipa al brillar el sol, que los rostros de la corrupción que acecha en la oscuridad sean destruidos por su mano».
languages.original_text: "Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."

traits.locale_text: «Sean sus pensamientos como rayos de Su luz justiciera. Así como la noche eterna se disipa al brillar el sol, que los rostros de la corrupción que acecha en la oscuridad sean destruidos por su mano».

languages.text: 「あなたの思いを、主の復讐の光の光線とせよ。永遠の夜が太陽に触れれば消え去るように、闇に潜む腐敗の面々をあなたの手で滅ぼし尽くしなさい」
languages.original_text: "Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの思いを、主の復讐の光の光線とせよ。永遠の夜が太陽に触れれば消え去るように、闇に潜む腐敗の面々をあなたの手で滅ぼし尽くしなさい」

languages.text: “愿您的思想成为祂复仇的明光。愿您的双手净化潜伏在黑暗之中的腐化，正如太阳的明光驱散永恒的黑夜一般。”
languages.original_text: "Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."

traits.locale_text: “愿您的思想成为祂复仇的明光。愿您的双手净化潜伏在黑暗之中的腐化，正如太阳的明光驱散永恒的黑夜一般。”

languages.text: "Mögen Eure Gedanken Stahlen Seines rächenden Lichtes sein. Wie die ewige Nacht durch die Berührung einer Sonne schwindet, mögen die Fratzen der Verderbnis, die in der Dunkelheit lauern, durch Eure Hand vernichtet werden."
languages.original_text: "Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."

traits.locale_text: "Mögen Eure Gedanken Stahlen Seines rächenden Lichtes sein. Wie die ewige Nacht durch die Berührung einer Sonne schwindet, mögen die Fratzen der Verderbnis, die in der Dunkelheit lauern, durch Eure Hand vernichtet werden."

languages.text: « Que vos pensées soient tels les rayons de Sa lumière vengeresse. Tout comme la nuit éternelle s'efface sous la caresse du soleil, puissiez-vous anéantir de vos mains les multiples visages de la corruption tapis dans les ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."

traits.locale_text: « Que vos pensées soient tels les rayons de Sa lumière vengeresse. Tout comme la nuit éternelle s'efface sous la caresse du soleil, puissiez-vous anéantir de vos mains les multiples visages de la corruption tapis dans les ténèbres. »

languages.text: "Düşünceleriniz, O'nun intikam dolu ışığının huzmeleri gibi olsun. Nasıl ebedî gece, güneşin dokunuşuyla siliniyorsa yozlaşmanın karanlıkta kol gezen suretleri de bizim ellerimizle yok edilecek."
languages.original_text: "Let your thoughts be as rays of His avenging light. As eternal night does fade at the touch of a sun, so let the faces of corruption that lurk in the darkness be destroyed by your hand."
